2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $428,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Philadelphia on 7/5/1990 (Going to PIT: 1B Ricky Jordan. Going to PHI: RF Joe Orsulak)...
9/2/1990: Signed a contract extension with Philadelphia, $1,540,000 per year, for 4 years.
